message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,300,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a concession to make this deal work for both of us. What do you think?
